CONTRACT_ID: T8493-230056 (WS) - Windshield for the Bell 429 Aircraft
short_summary: A Request for Proposal (RFP) will be issued for the procurement of an aircraft part for the Bell 429 Aircraft Fleet.
description: This procurement is to acquire an aircraft part for the Bell 429 Aircraft for Transport Canada (TC), the Air Services Directorate (ASD).
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Title and Reference Number
**Tender Title:** Windshield for the Bell 429 Aircraft
**Tender Reference Number:** WS4324187805

## Tender Details
- **Tender Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering (Restricted to qualified Supply Arrangement holders)
- **Goods:** Aircraft Part (Windshield) for the Bell 429 Aircraft Fleet
- **End User:** Transport Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD)
- **Tender Closing Date:** December 6, 2023 (14:00 EST)
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 13, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date:** December 6, 2024

## Business Requirements
This tender is to procure an aircraft part for the Bell 429 Aircraft Fleet. The requirement is detailed in the Annex A – Requirement Quotation. 

**Important Amendment:** Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be made by December 6, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Any bid submissions made after this time will be declared non-responsive.

## Contracting Entity and Contact Information
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau QC K1A 0S5, Canada
- **Contact Person:** Valerie Bourassa, <valerie.bourassa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

## Trade Opportunities and Agreements
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Delivery:** Ottawa, Ontario
